That's what we're gonna
look at in this series.

3471.52.text:
Let me close with a
little self evaluation.

3473.84.text: Why don't you ask these questions

3484.38.text:
You know, the ones I'm
going through right now.

3487.01.text:
Are you using these
problems to inspect me?

3488.69.text: If so, what does it reveal about my life?

3494.61.text: Is there a misplaced priority in my life?

3498.30.text:
Is there someplace I've
compromised the truth?

3503.10.text: And you're trying to show it to me.

3507.45.text: are you using this problem to correct me?

3511.84.text: If so, what do you want me to learn?

3516.25.text: Why is this happening to me.

3518.15.text: What do you want me to learn?

3519.40.text: What do you want me to know?

3523.74.text: Lord are you using this problem,

3525.18.text: not just to inspect or correct me,

3526.51.text: are you using this problem to direct me?

3532.73.text: What do you want me to change?

3536.93.text: Where do you want me headed?

3540.88.text:
Lord, are you using this
problem to protect me?

3546.72.text: Did that thing not happen because

3549.67.text: you knew something that I didn't know?

3552.28.text: And I was walking into a bigger trap?

3560.77.text: If so Lord, then I'm just gonna tell you,

3564.22.text: I know that you know best.

3567.89.text: And God I want you to protect me.

3570.59.text: And when there is something that I want,

3572.16.text: that would be bad for me,

3576.41.text: I want your will more than my will.

3584.33.text: are you using this problem to perfect me?

3588.58.text: See God's at work in your life,

3589.69.text: even when you don't recognize it

3592.66.text: God's work in your life is not dependent

3598.16.text:
So I want you to pray
this prayer, very simply.

3600.58.text:
Dear God, I wanna trust
you with all my heart.

3604.27.text: Just say it in your minds,

3605.26.text: I trust you with all my heart.

3610.16.text:
I'm not gonna depend on
my own understanding.

3614.96.text:
And God, I wanna honor
you in everything I do.

3625.00.text:
and I don't depend on
my own understanding,

3626.45.text: and I honor you in everything I do,

3627.70.text: you promised to give me success.

3634.04.text: Teach me through the life of Daniel

3639.69.text: Jesus Christ, I wanna trust you

3643.60.text: as best as I know how.

3648.11.text: In your name I pray, Amen.
